With a steady hand and the help of Tuscon, Lord Elder brought the
shuttle down to a relatively safe landing. There was only the
slightest jarring bump as they touched ground. Shutting down power to
the engines Lord Elder turned to look at the others.

"Quickstride and Rat Trap." he said gravely, "Report to Lord Perseus
at the old base, either he or Legacy should be able to fill you in on
the situation there." Elder glanced at the computer screen which still
showed a minion flying above the old base.

"Be very careful. Minions are not Autobots and are more than
Decepticons or Predacons, and are not to be underestimated."

Elder looked at Tuscon although he was still talking to Quickstride
and Rat Trap, "Remember the war we just fought a short while ago to
protect the Ark from from the Minion's attack? At that time Cyclonus
was a hearld of Unicron himself. With the power Unicron was giving him
he was able to defeat Rodimus Prime." Elder frowned, "We think it was
that defeat that allowed Hydras to capture Rodimus and turn him into
what he is now."

Turning to look at the screen and then at Rat Trap and Quickstride
Elder continued, "If this Minion is willing to take on the entire base
by himself, he may be that powerful as well, or even more so."

Elder turned to look at Tuscon once again, "As for mucking around with
Predacon shell programs, hmmmm." he said thoughtfully. "We have not
had that much success with reversing them." Elder tapped his finger
idly on the console, "Remember when Optimus Primal first crashed here
on old Earth? Megatron had been able to beat us to some of the Maximal
pods, and use his shell program to turn them into Predacons." Elder
sighed, "Some of them are still on his side today."

"I'm not saying it's impossible, I'm just saying that it's going to be
difficult." Elder said as he looked around at everyone.

(TAG)

(OOC: I am not sure what Tuscon and Rat Trap were trying to do, when
they were attempting to 'tap into Rodimus via Predacon code'??)

Preston
(Lord Elder)
